addEquipment.success: Flight equipment has been successfully registered
addEquipment.yearError: Year of manufacture must be after 1980 and before {currentYear}
addEquipment.flightHoursError: Flight hours must be greater than or equal to 0
addEquipment.serialNumberNotePart2: If you want to enter a serial number, please provide both the serial number and the image of the serial number

addEquipment.equipmentDetailsNote1: Ensure the accuracy of the equipment details

editEquipment.success: Your flight equipment changes have been applied
editEquipment.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in the required information
editEquipment.parachuteSerialNote:
By filling this field and syncing the parachute serial with the related pilot, the serial cannot be registered by another person, unless in case of sale and transfer of the serial number to the new owner.
In case of loss of the parachute, please inform us via ticket.
editEquipment.wingSerialNote:
By filling this field and syncing the wing serial with the related pilot, the serial cannot be registered by another person, unless in case of sale and transfer of the serial number to the new owner.
In case of loss of the wing, please inform us via ticket.
editEquipment.harnessSerialNote:
By filling this field and syncing the harness serial with the related pilot, the serial cannot be registered by another person, unless in case of sale and transfer of the serial number to the new owner.
In case of loss of the harness, please inform us via ticket.
editEquipment.uploadFileFormats: *Accepted file formats: BMP, GIF, JPEG, JPG, PNG up to 10 MB
editEquipment.confirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to confirm the changes?
